article_title: Remnick on Sochi; Obamacare Rollout Problems; MFA or NYC
article_text: The Sochi Olympics wrapped up over the weekend. New Yorker editor David Remnick recaps the politically-tense Winter Games. Plus: MSNBC analyst Jonathan Alter explains how President Obama’s management style led to what Alter calls the failure of the launch of the Affordable Care Act and the author of The Art of Fielding, Chad Harbach, and literary agent Mel Flashman discuss the two different routes contemporary fiction writers can take to achieve professional success.

article_summary:
The Sochi Olympics wrapped up over the weekend.
New Yorker editor David Remnick recaps the politically-tense Winter Games.
Plus: MSNBC analyst Jonathan Alter explains how President Obama’s management style led to what Alter calls the failure of the launch of the Affordable Care Act and the author of The Art of Fielding, Chad Harbach, and literary agent Mel Flashman discuss the two different routes contemporary fiction writers can take to achieve professional success.
